settings.title: Quit Smoking
settings.subtitle: Quitting smoking is difficult but we're here to make it easier. Find our range of nicotine replacement treatments available as patches, gums and other medications below.

settings.title: Why should you quit smoking?
settings.text: Smoking can be a very hard habit to kick but if your health is at risk, it is important to take the steps to reduce your smoking addiction. When you stop smoking, your lungs will have the opportunity to repair, which will improve your breathing. Quitting will also improve your mental health and wellbeing while reducing stress, anxiety and depression.

settings.title: How does medication help to stop smoking?
settings.text: There are several treatments available to aid you while you quit smoking. Nicotine replacement therapies (NRTs) are the most common as they provide the nicotine you're craving without the harmful chemicals you inhale when smoking. We offer NRTs as patches, chewing gum and tablets.

settings.title: Of All Adults
settings.text: in England are smokers. The national ambition of the UK is to reduce the number of active smokers to 12% or below.

settings.title: Of Youth Population
settings.text: reported that they plan to quit smoking and are actively trying to stop using all tobacco products.

settings.title: Stop smoking services online
settings.text: “There are many reasons to quit smoking, and each person has their own motivation for doing so. Some people want to improve their health, while others want to save money or set a good example for their children. No matter what your reason is, quitting smoking is a big challenge. But it's one that you can definitely overcome with the right mindset and support system!”
settings.name: Dr Sameer Nakedar

settings.title: Complete A Quick Online Consultation Form
settings.text: Fill out a quick and simple online consultation form to find out what products you are eligible for.

settings.title: Checkout Securely
settings.text: Once you have completed your consultation and selected your treatment, you can securely checkout online.

settings.title: Express Delivery
settings.text: You will then receive your order the next working day using our express next-day courier service, dispensed from one of our verified GhPC partner pharmacies in the UK.

settings.title: What are the five main reasons to quit smoking?
settings.text: Smoking is harmful to the heart and lungs. It can cause cardiovascular disease as well as respiratory disease. Smoking is also a known cancer-causing agent. Lung cancer risk increases significantly with smoking. Also, passive smoking is harmful to the near and dear ones around you.

settings.title: What can I expect when I quit smoking?
settings.text:
You might experience the following withdrawal symptoms:

1. Restlessness

2. Cravings

3. Anxiety

4. Trouble focusing

5. Weight gain

settings.title: What is the best timeline to go by when quitting smoking?
settings.text: You should give yourself at least 2 to 12 weeks before you see any noticeable results. The body circulation improves and physical exercise will become easier. In this timeframe, the addiction should have ended.

settings.title: How do NRT patches work?
settings.text: The patch contains a small amount of nicotine that is delivered to your blood. It works by decreasing the amount of nicotine given to you gradually and helping you overcome the addiction.

settings.title: How long does it take to receive my order?
settings.text: All orders placed before 14:00 from Monday to Friday will be dispatched that day. The orders are sent using 24 Hour Tracked delivery provided by Royal Mail. Items will usually arrive the very next day after the order has been placed. We also provide tracking for your orders to check the status and location of your parcel.

settings.title: How is the medication packaged?
settings.text: All our medication is packaged in plain confidential padded white or brown envelopes. This ensures that your orders are discreet, and the content of the orders will be for your eyes only.

settings.title: Can I cancel my order?
settings.text: You have the right to cancel your order for medication up to the point when your medication is dispatched.

settings.title: Can I return my order?
settings.text: For non-medicinal products, you are eligible to return the product within 14 days of receipt in the same packaging you received. For medicinal products, you are eligible to cancel the order only until it has been dispatched. From that point forward, you are no longer eligible to return the order.
